verses.verse: And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Thou and thy sons<WH1121> and thy fathers<WH1>' house<WH1004> with thee shall bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of the sanctuary<WH4720>; and thou and thy sons<WH1121> with thee shall bear<WH5375> the iniquity<WH5771> of your priesthood<WH3550>.

And thy brethren<WH251> also<WH4294>, the tribe of Levi<WH3878>, the tribe<WH4294> of thy father<WH1>, bring<WH7126> thou near with thee<WH3867>, that they may be joined unto thee<WH8334>, and minister unto thee<WH1121>: but thou and thy sons with thee shall be before<WH6440> the tent<WH168> of the testimony<WH5715>.

And they shall keep<WH8104> thy charge<WH4931>, and the charge<WH4931> of all the Tent<WH168>: only they shall not come nigh<WH7126> unto the vessels<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> and unto the altar<WH4196>, that they die not<WH4191>, neither they, nor ye.

And they shall be joined<WH3867> unto thee<WH8104>, and keep the charge<WH4931> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, for all the service<WH5656> of the Tent<WH168>: and a stranger<WH2114> shall not come nigh unto you<WH7126>.
And ye shall keep<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the sanctuary<WH6944>, and the charge<WH4931> of the altar<WH4196>; that there be wrath<WH7110> no more upon the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And I<WH3947>, behold, I have taken your brethren<WH251> the Levites<WH3881> from among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>: to you they are a gift<WH4979>, given<WH5414> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, to do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.

And thou and thy sons<WH1121> with thee shall keep<WH8104> your priesthood<WH3550> for everything<WH1697> of the altar<WH4196>, and for that within<WH1004> the veil<WH6532>; and ye shall serve<WH5647>: I give<WH5414> you the priesthood<WH3550> as a service<WH5656> of gift<WH4979>: and the stranger<WH2114> that cometh nigh<WH7131> shall be put to death<WH4191>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Aaron<WH175>, And I<WH5414>, behold, I have given thee the charge<WH4931> of my heave-offerings<WH8641>, even all the hallowed things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; unto thee have I given<WH5414> them by reason of the anointing<WH4888>, and to thy sons<WH1121>, as a portion<WH2706> for ever<WH5769>.

This shall be thine of the most<WH6944> holy things<WH6944>, reserved from the fire<WH784>: every oblation<WH7133> of theirs<WH4503>, even every meal-offering of theirs<WH4503>, and every sin-offering of theirs<WH817>, and every trespass-offering of theirs<WH7725>, which they shall render unto me<WH6944>, shall be most holy<WH6944> for thee and for thy sons<WH1121>.
As the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> things shalt thou eat<WH398> thereof<WH2145>; every male shall eat<WH398> thereof<WH6944>: it shall be holy unto thee.

And this is thine<WH8641>: the heave-offering of their gift<WH4976>, even all the wave-offerings<WH8573> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; I have given<WH5414> them unto thee<WH1121>, and to thy sons and to thy daughters<WH1323> with thee<WH2706>, as a portion for ever<WH5769>; every one that is clean<WH2889> in thy house<WH1004> shall eat thereof<WH398>.

All the best<WH2459> of the oil<WH3323>, and all the best<WH2459> of the vintage<WH8492>, and of the grain<WH1715>, the first-fruits<WH7225> of them which they give<WH5414> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, to thee have I given them<WH5414>.

The first-ripe<WH1061> fruits of all that is in their land<WH776>, which they bring<WH935> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, shall be thine<WH2889>; every one that is clean in thy house<WH1004> shall eat thereof<WH398>.
Everything devoted<WH2764> in Israel shall be thine<WH3478>.

Everything that openeth<WH6363> the womb<WH7358>, of all flesh<WH1320> which they offer<WH7126> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, both of man<WH120> and beast<WH929> shall be thine<WH1060>: nevertheless the first-born of man<WH120> shalt thou surely<WH6299> redeem<WH6299>, and the firstling<WH1060> of unclean<WH2931> beasts<WH929> shalt thou redeem<WH6299>.

And those that are to be redeemed<WH6299> of them from a month<WH2320> old<WH1121> shalt thou redeem<WH6299>, according to thine estimation<WH6187>, for the money<WH3701> of five<WH2568> shekels<WH8255>, after the shekel<WH8255> of the sanctuary<WH6944> (the same is twenty<WH6242> gerahs<WH1626>).

But the firstling<WH1060> of a cow<WH7794>, or the firstling<WH1060> of a sheep<WH3775>, or the firstling<WH1060> of a goat<WH5795>, thou shalt not redeem<WH6299>; they are holy<WH6944>: thou shalt sprinkle<WH2236> their blood<WH1818> upon the altar<WH4196>, and shalt burn<WH6999> their fat<WH2459> for an offering made by fire<WH801>, for a sweet<WH5207> savor<WH7381> unto Jehovah<WH3068>.
And the flesh<WH1320> of them shall be thine<WH8573>, as the wave - breast<WH2373> and as the right<WH3225> thigh<WH7785>, it shall be thine.

All the heave-offerings<WH8641> of the holy things<WH6944>, which the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> offer<WH7311> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, have I given<WH5414> thee<WH1121>, and thy sons and thy daughters<WH1323> with thee<WH2706>, as a portion for ever<WH5769>: it is a covenant<WH1285> of salt<WH4417> for ever<WH5769> before<WH6440> Jehovah<WH3068> unto thee and to thy seed with thee<WH2233>.

And Jehovah<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Aaron<WH175>, Thou shalt have no inheritance<WH5157> in their land<WH776>, neither shalt thou have any portion<WH2506> among<WH8432> them<WH2506>: I am thy portion and thine inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.

And unto the children<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, behold<WH5414>, I have given all the tithe in Israel<WH3478> for<WH2500> an inheritance<WH5159>, in return for<WH2500> their service<WH5656> which they serve<WH5647>, even the service<WH5656> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.
And henceforth<WH5750> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall not come nigh<WH7126> the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, lest they bear<WH5375> sin<WH2399>, and die<WH4191>.

But the Levites<WH3881> shall do<WH5647> the service<WH5656> of the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>, and they shall bear<WH5375> their iniquity<WH5771>: it shall be a statute<WH2708> for ever<WH5769> throughout your generations<WH1755>; and among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> they shall have<WH5157> no inheritance<WH5159>.

For the tithe<WH4643> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, which they offer<WH7311> as a heave-offering<WH8641> unto Jehovah<WH3068>, I have given<WH5414> to the Levites<WH3881> for an inheritance<WH5159>: therefore I have said<WH559> unto them<WH8432>, Among the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> they shall have<WH5157> no inheritance<WH5159>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872>, saying<WH559>,

Moreover thou shalt speak<WH1696> unto the Levites<WH3881>, and say<WH559> unto them<WH3947>, When ye take of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> the tithe<WH4643> which I have given<WH5414> you from them for your inheritance<WH5159>, then ye shall offer<WH7311> up a heave-offering<WH8641> of it for Jehovah<WH3068>, a tithe<WH4643> of the tithe<WH4643>.
And your heave-offering<WH8641> shall be reckoned<WH2803> unto you<WH1715>, as though it were the grain of the threshing-floor<WH1637>, and as the fulness<WH4395> of the winepress<WH3342>.

Thus ye also shall offer<WH7311> a heave-offering<WH8641> unto Jehovah<WH3068> of all your tithes<WH4643>, which ye receive<WH3947> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>; and thereof ye shall give<WH5414> Jehovah<WH3068>'s heave-offering<WH8641> to Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548>.
Out of all your gifts<WH4979> ye shall offer<WH7311> every heave-offering<WH8641> of Jehovah<WH3068>, of all the best<WH2459> thereof<WH4720>, even the hallowed part thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt say<WH559> unto them<WH7311>, When ye heave the best<WH2459> thereof from it<WH2803>, then it shall be reckoned unto the Levites<WH3881> as the increase<WH8393> of the threshing-floor<WH1637>, and as the increase<WH8393> of the wine-press<WH3342>.
And ye shall eat<WH398> it in every place<WH4725>, ye and your households<WH1004>: for it is your reward<WH7939> in return for<WH2500> your service<WH5656> in the tent<WH168> of meeting<WH4150>.

And ye shall bear<WH5375> no sin<WH2399> by reason of it<WH7311>, when ye have heaved from it the best<WH2459> thereof<WH2490>: and ye shall not profane the holy things<WH6944> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, that ye die not<WH4191>.
